title: 'The Dow' for Crypto Markets? New CoinDesk 20 Index Underpins Futures Contracts at Bullish
description: Perpetual futures tied to the index at crypto exchange Bullish, which owns CoinDesk, could help the CoinDesk 20 become a widely followed benchmark akin to the 128-year-old Dow Jones Industrial Average.

title: Bitcoin ETFs could attract billions from TradFi, says BitMEX founder Arthur Hayes
description: Hayes forecasts a new era of Bitcoin arbitrage with ETFs, potentially shifting billions in capital and unlocking new trading venues.

title: Dogecoin (DOGE) Struggles with Resistance, Shiba Inu (SHIB) Eyes Bullish Breakout: Key Levels to Watch!
description: Dive into the thrilling world of cryptocurrency with our latest analysis on Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB). Discover how DOGE is navigating its challenging resistance levels and the potential for a comeback, while SHIB shows signs of a bullish breakout despite recent market volatility. Our expert insight covers key technical indicators, market trends, and predictions, offering a comprehensive view of these popular meme coins.

title: Uniswap Allocates $300,000 To Develop V4 Front-End
description: Decentralized exchange Uniswap has announced that it is allocating $300,000 for an engineering team to develop its V4 front-end for new pool launchers and liquidity providers.

title: Grayscale’s Bitcoin ETF sees $1.1 billion outflow amid narrowing discount
description: In a significant turn of events in the cryptocurrency market, approximately $1.1 billion has flowed out of Grayscale’s Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) in just three days. This sudden outflow comes as investors rushed to exit the fund, primarily driven by the narrowing discount on the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC).  The discount reached its lowest level […]

title: Federal judge delays SEC trial against Terraform Labs, and co-founder Do Kwon
description: In a recent development, US District Judge Jed Rakoff in Manhattan has decided to postpone the trial of Terraform Labs and its co-founder Do Kwon, who are facing allegations of a $40 billion cryptocurrency fraud.  The trial was initially scheduled to begin on January 29 but has now been rescheduled to March 25. title: Driving Innovation: AI’s Impact Across Industries
description: In the relentless pursuit of precision and efficiency, the automotive industry stands at the forefront of digital transformation, embracing AI to revolutionize manufacturing processes. title: Ethereum’s Dencun Upgrade: A Leap Forward on Goerli Testnet
description: In a significant stride towards enhancing the Ethereum network, core developers have successfully deployed the Dencun upgrade on the Goerli testnet. Integrating the proto-dank sharding feature (EIP-4844), marks a crucial phase in Ethereum’s evolution, setting the stage for its subsequent release on the mainnet, anticipated in the early part of 2024. title: Ripple CEO delays IPO plans amid ongoing legal battle with SEC
description: In a recent announcement, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse confirmed that the company has temporarily shelved its plans for an initial public offering (IPO) due to an ongoing legal dispute with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).  Garlinghouse expressed concerns about the regulatory climate in the United States and the challenges it poses to […]

title: Energy Breakthrough Needed for Sustainable AI Development, Says OpenAI CEO
description: In a recent statement at the World Economic Forum’s annual meeting in Davos, Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, emphasized the urgent need for an energy breakthrough to sustain the unprecedented growth of artificial intelligence (AI). title: Binance Futures Introduces USDC-Margined DOGE Perpetual Contract with 75x Leverage

title: WEMIX launches ‘una Wallet’ to enable safest and most convenient digital asset management across blockchains

title: IRS Halts Implementation on Crypto Tax Rule
description:
The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) will not require US businesses to file reports on transactions exceeding $10,000 until it establishes a legal framework. The IRS explained that the decision came after the U.S. Treasury Department and the IRS revised the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act (IIJ Act). Let’s explore more about it. title: Vitalik Buterin Highlights Core Issues Around Layer 2 Networks
description:
Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin has highlighted the core issues around blockchain Layer-two (L2) protocols. Buterin offered his opinion in a debate among Ethereum community members on X.
